instruction: Describe a successful strategy you have employed when resolving a dispute.
output: When resolving a dispute, I have found success by first listening to both sides carefully and patiently before taking action. I then take the time to understand the underlying motives and ascertain the desired outcome for all parties involved. I then formulate a solution that respects those outcomes while taking into account the needs and perspectives of both sides. This helps to create a space where all parties can feel heard and confident that the best solution has been reached.
